paragraph.paragraph:
Users may want to archive the result of the system they are working on. To create an archive, you must have already clicked on
16 16 /images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_delete_small_color.gif 0 in the "Metric" tab of the context tool.

list.item: In the "Create/replace archive" frame, click on "Browse".
Select a folder and enter the name of the archive you are about to create. (Do not forget the ".xml" location!)

paragraph.paragraph: All the available metrics (except for scope comparison ones, since) are then evaluated over the system scope. Measures are saved in the specified file.
paragraph.note: Note: A warning dialog will inform you in case an error occurs (the created file already exists, or you cannot create a file in current location).

link.label: Evaluating a metric over an archive
